component.name: getFavoritesList
component.description: Returns the 20 most recent Tweets favorited by the authenticating or specified user.

component.name: createFavorites
component.description: Favorites the status specified in the ID parameter as the authenticating user. Returns the favorite status when successful. This process invoked by this method is asynchronous. The immediately returned status may not indicate the resultant favorited status of the tweet. A 200 OK response from this method will indicate whether the intended action was successful or not.

component.name: destroyFavorites
component.description: Un-favorites the status specified in the ID parameter as the authenticating user. Returns the un-favorited status in the requested format when successful. This process invoked by this method is asynchronous. The immediately returned status may not indicate the resultant favorited status of the tweet. A 200 OK response from this method will indicate whether the intended action was successful or not.
